p: Statistical analysis was performed by one-way ANOVA analysis of variance, when statistical significance at p < 0.05 was evaluated. A parametric Tukey post-hoc test and nonparametric Gamesâ€“Howel post hoc test were used for finding differences within groups. Principal component analysis (PCA) was used for the determination of overall differences among samples. SPSS 20 statistical software (IBM Corporation) was used for all statistical evaluation.
